import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function CartTotals({value}) { const {cartSubTotal, cartTax, cartTotal, clearCart} = value; return (
subtotal: ₹ {cartSubTotal}
tax: ₹ {cartTax}
total: ₹ {cartTotal}
) }
